#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
    int main()
    {
        long long t,z,i,j,k,n,m,s,ans;
        scanf("%lld",&t);
        for(z=1;z<=t;z++)
        {
        	long long r,x,y,x0,y0,v;
            scanf("%lld%lld%lld%lld%lld%lld",&r,&x,&y,&x0,&y0,&v);
           	double a;
           	a=r-sqrt((x-x0)*(x-x0)+(y-y0)*(y-y0));
           	if(a<=0)
           		printf("0.0000000000\n");
           	else
            printf("%.10lf\n",a/v);
        }
        return 0;
    }
